name: SHEEP IT !
description:
Try to control the flock of short memory sheep with your mighty floppo dog !

Make sure they don't get caught in traps or get lost during the trip and bring them to the right trucks to make the best score.

The game doesn't have audio so you can blast the song "Beep beep I'm a sheep" from LilDeuceDeuce on your headphones. :)

How to Play:

Xbox Controller: Use the Y X B A buttons to give directional orders and the left stick to move the floppo dog.

Keyboard: Use the Directional Arrows to give directional orders and ZQSD to move the floppo dog.

Credits:

Programmers: Marie HAUUY / Axel DESHORS

Artist: Swann KLEIN
